basics.name: Ahmad Ali
basics.label: Flutter Developer
basics.summary: Flutter Developer with hands-on experience in building secure and scalable mobile applications. Proficient in Flutter, Dart, and SQLCipher, with a solid understanding of modular app architecture, performance optimization, and user-centric UI/UX design. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and continuously learning modern mobile development practices.

work.name: GrithX Solutions (Pvt) Ltd.
work.summary: Currently working as a Flutter Developer, contributing to production-level mobile application development.
highlights: Developing, implementing, and maintaining Flutter-based mobile application features using Dart
Designing and building responsive, reusable, and scalable UI components following Material Design principles
Applying clean code practices, modular architecture, and separation of concerns to improve maintainability
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Participating in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices
Testing and debugging mobile applications to ensure smooth performance and user experience
Optimizing application performance, UI responsiveness, and user experience
Debugging, testing, and resolving application issues to ensure stability and reliability
Following version control best practices using Git
Staying updated with the latest mobile development trends and technologies

work.name: GrithX Solutions (Pvt) Ltd.
work.summary: Worked as a Flutter Developer on a production-grade mobile application as part of a Final Year Project, focusing on secure communication, clean architecture, performance optimization, and automated deployment workflows.
highlights: Designed and developed a production-level mobile application using Flutter and Dart with a modular and scalable architecture
Implemented end-to-end encryption mechanisms based on industry-standard cryptographic principles
Worked with secure key exchange and message encryption techniques to ensure data confidentiality
Integrated encrypted local storage using SQLCipher to protect sensitive application data at rest
Implemented biometric authentication for secure user access and identity protection
Added screen protection features to prevent screenshots and screen recording
Developed real-time messaging workflows with reliable message delivery handling
Worked with background services and connection management for persistent app functionality
Built responsive and reusable UI components following Material Design 3 guidelines
Translated Figma designs into pixel-perfect Flutter UI
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline to automate build, testing, and deployment processes
Used Git-based version control and CI workflows to ensure code quality and deployment consistency
Focused on performance optimization, clean code practices, and long-term maintainability
Created detailed technical documentation covering architecture, security design, and application workflows

work.name: Upwork
work.summary: Worked as a UI/UX Designer on freelance projects, designing mobile application interfaces with a strong focus on usability, visual consistency, and user-centered design principles.
highlights: Designed intuitive and user-friendly mobile application interfaces using Figma
Created wireframes, user flows, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Applied mobile-first and responsive design principles to enhance user experience
Collaborated closely with developers to ensure accurate and feasible design implementation
Conducted design iterations based on feedback to improve usability and visual clarity
Maintained design consistency through reusable components and design systems
Focused on accessibility, layout hierarchy, and user experience optimization
Delivered client-ready UI assets aligned with project requirements and timelines

work.name: GrithX Solutions (Pvt) Ltd.
work.summary: Worked as a DevOps and Server Administrator, managing web hosting infrastructure, server operations, and client-facing technical support with a focus on reliability, performance, and system stability.
highlights: Managed and administered web hosting servers using cPanel and WHM
Handled client billing, service provisioning, and account management using WHMCS
Created, configured, and maintained hosting accounts, domains, and DNS records
Monitored server uptime, performance, and resource utilization
Diagnosed and resolved server, network, and hosting-related technical issues
Ensured server stability, security, and backup management
Provided customer-focused technical support and issue resolution
Collaborated with internal teams to maintain service availability and quality

awards.title: Top 5 FYP – Nexus 2025, NUML
awards.summary: Participated with the Connectify project in the university-wide Nexus 2025 competition, achieving a Top 5 position and receiving high appreciation from faculty for innovation, security implementation, and technical excellence.

projects.name: Connectify
projects.description: A production-grade, privacy-focused peer-to-peer messaging application designed for anonymous and secure communication without requiring phone numbers or centralized servers.
highlights: Integrated a real Tor-based embedded binary to enable anonymous network communication using genuine .onion addresses
Implemented a peer-to-peer (P2P) communication model eliminating the need for central servers
Applied Signal Protocol concepts, including X3DH key exchange and Double Ratchet algorithm, to achieve end-to-end encrypted messaging
Ensured forward secrecy and message confidentiality through per-message encryption
Secured local message storage using SQLCipher for encrypted database persistence
Implemented biometric authentication and secure key storage for protected application access
Added screen protection mechanisms to prevent screenshots and screen recording
Designed and developed a responsive, cross-platform mobile UI using Flutter and Dart
Followed clean code practices and modular architecture for maintainability and scalability
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate build and deployment workflows
Created comprehensive technical documentation covering architecture, security, and application workflows

projects.name: CodeX & KryptoniteOS Mobile App UI/UX
projects.description: Designed complete UI/UX for chat and calling applications for CodeX and KryptoniteOS, focusing on usability, visual consistency, and modern mobile design standards.
highlights: Created end-to-end UI/UX designs for chat and calling applications using Figma
Developed wireframes, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity screens for messaging and call workflows
Designed intuitive user flows for sending/receiving messages, initiating calls, and managing contacts
Applied mobile-first design principles, visual hierarchy, and accessibility standards
Maintained design consistency with reusable components, typography, and color systems
Collaborated with developers to ensure accurate handoff and implementation of designs in mobile apps
Optimized layouts and interactions to enhance user experience and usability across devices
